metadata.title: CVE-2010-4654 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: poppler before 0.16.3 has malformed commands that may cause corruption of the internal stack.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> first patch may change API/ABI first patch is for protection, second patch actually fixes particular issue. Second patch is included in Lucid's poppler, so we're not affected.

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
